promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young legendary cat normal-type pokemon wearing a ancient crown. It can be found in grassland-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or cat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Regalpurr, a a chibi young legendary cat normal-type pokemon. It can be found in grassland-like environments It has the following abilities: Slashing Claw, Supersonic. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "cat", "normal" or "Regalpurr". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, cat-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pastel colors
generatedDescription: This petite royal feline, with powerful claws and a supersonic voice, loves frolicking in vast meadows. Its playful tenacity is legendary.
